title: 570. No Such Thing As Clay Valentines Cards
content:
For a Valentine's Day special, Dan, James, Andy and Anna discuss flirting, proclaiming love, getting together, and ignoring one's mother-in-law.

Visit nosuchthingasafish.com for news about live shows, merchandise and more episodes.
